overview:
VZAZZ is becoming the largest syndicated network of locally deployed, published and managed trusted web assets designed to accelerate local online visibility and interaction for the Home Improvement Industry!

Mr. Gregory Hilz, Founder / CEO: Mr. Hilz has 25 years of experience as a principal in Technology, Communications and Computing Industries. He has been co-founder in several related startup companies, HCP a technology distributor sold, New Age Technology a computer network integrator, sold to EDS; , PCSS a private start up taken public as international reseller of computer parts and depot repair to global business communities; Total Media Technologies; a West Coast Regional Communications Company; TMT was sold to The Macerich Company. Mr. Hilz is an experienced in Video / Compression and internet communications and CDN distribution and creation of content for businesses and consumers.
